name: B2B & Commercial Real Estate Cold Call Openers
description: 20 ultra-strong cold call opener scripts for B2B and Commercial Real Estate

templates.name: Pattern Interrupt - Time Check
templates.script: {{first_name}}? Hey, did I catch you at a bad time? [Wait for response] Perfect, I'll be brief. This is Tommy with Nextier — I've been researching {{company_name}} and I have buyers actively looking in your space. Have you ever had your business valued?

templates.name: Direct Value Proposition
templates.script: {{first_name}}, Tommy Borruso with Nextier. I'll cut right to it — I help business owners understand what they're sitting on. I have buyers paying 4-6x EBITDA right now. Ever wondered what {{company_name}} might fetch?

templates.name: Referral Pivot
templates.script: {{first_name}}? Hey, this is Tommy with Nextier. I was actually referred to you by someone in your industry — they thought you might be interested in understanding your exit options. Got 2 minutes?

templates.name: Curiosity Hook
templates.script: {{first_name}}, quick question — if I could show you what buyers would actually pay for {{company_name}} in the next 15 minutes, would that be worth your time? This is Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: Authority Position
templates.script: {{first_name}}, Tommy Borruso with Nextier. I work exclusively with business owners who want to understand their real market value — not some online calculator number. I'm calling because {{company_name}} fits our buyer profile.

templates.name: CRE - Property Opportunity
templates.script: {{first_name}}? Tommy with Nextier. I'm reaching out because I have investors actively looking for properties like {{property_address}}. Have you considered what your equity position looks like in today's market?

templates.name: CRE - Cap Rate Discussion
templates.script: {{first_name}}, quick question on {{property_address}} — cap rates in your area are compressing, which means your property might be worth 15-20% more than last year. Ever run the numbers recently? Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: CRE - 1031 Exchange
templates.script: {{first_name}}? Tommy Borruso with Nextier. I work with investors doing 1031 exchanges and I have several looking for properties exactly like {{property_address}}. Any interest in exploring your options?

templates.name: Timing Play
templates.script: {{first_name}}, timing is everything in M&A. Right now, buyers are paying premiums for businesses like {{company_name}}. I can show you what that looks like in 15 minutes. Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: Competitor Mention
templates.script: {{first_name}}, I recently helped a business similar to {{company_name}} understand their exit options — they were shocked at the number. Thought you might be curious about yours. Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: CEO Direct Approach
templates.script: Is this {{first_name}}? Perfect. Look, I'm not going to waste your time. I work with PE firms looking for acquisitions in your exact space. They asked me to reach out. 2 minutes?

templates.name: Exit Planning Angle
templates.script: {{first_name}}, most business owners I talk to have no exit plan — they just figure they'll sell someday. I help them get clarity years before they need it. Worth a quick conversation? Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: CRE - Development Potential
templates.script: {{first_name}}? Tommy with Nextier. I've been looking at {{property_address}} — there's some interesting development potential there that most owners overlook. Have you had a highest-and-best-use analysis done?

templates.name: Market Intelligence
templates.script: {{first_name}}, I have real-time data on what businesses like {{company_name}} are actually selling for — not asking prices, actual closed deals. Interested in seeing where you'd fall?

templates.name: CRE - Rent Comp
templates.script: {{first_name}}? Quick question — are you aware that similar properties to {{property_address}} are commanding 10-15% higher rents right now? That impacts your valuation significantly. Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: Retirement Angle
templates.script: {{first_name}}, let me ask you something — when you think about retirement or your next chapter, do you have a clear picture of what {{company_name}} would contribute to that? I can help clarify it.

templates.name: Stress Test
templates.script: {{first_name}}, if someone walked in tomorrow with a serious offer for {{company_name}}, would you know if it was fair? I help owners stress test their business value before that moment comes.

templates.name: CRE - Cash Flow Analysis
templates.script: {{first_name}}, I've been analyzing cash flows in your area — {{property_address}} has some interesting upside potential. Have you optimized your NOI recently? Tommy with Nextier.

templates.name: Strategic Buyer Interest
templates.script: {{first_name}}, I have a strategic buyer specifically looking for businesses like {{company_name}} — not a financial buyer, someone who would pay a premium because of synergies. Interested?

templates.name: No Pressure Close
templates.script: {{first_name}}, here's the deal — I can give you a real number on what {{company_name}} is worth in 15 minutes. No pressure, no commitment. If the number isn't interesting, we shake hands and move on. Fair?
